descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]
Description[/size][size=4]:[/size][/b][size=4]
[/size]
This is my custom created body which I personally use. I created this body in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url] and now I want to share it with you guys.

My intention was to create a perfect but still natural looking body with a
noticeable range between weight 0 and 100. For my personal taste, I
managed it. I'm totally fine with how the body looks but maybe I'll
update the body if [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2442809]ChronoTrigger77[/url] updated his Remodeled Armor mod to 6.0.

English isn't my first language but I tried to write proper and understandable
but if you still find spelling mistakes, feel free to contact me for a
better description.

If you like the mod, I would be glad if you endorse it. If you want you can also upload a few pics, it would be much
apreciated. :)[size=2][color=#f4f4f4]

[/color][/size]
[b][size=4]Requirement:[/size][/b]


[list]
[*][size=2]Hearthfire[/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=2][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url][/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][b]
[/b][/size]
[size=4][b]Installation:[/b]
[/size]
[u]Manual[/u] - Simply download the file and extract everything into your Data folder.

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Download the file to NMM and install it like you would any other mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Download the file to MO and install it like you would any other mod.
Or download the archive manually and open the zip via MO and install.


[size=4][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]

[u]Manual[/u] - Simple remove the CherosSculptures.esp, the meshes/Sculptures folder and the textures/Sculptures folder,

remove in meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm

==> 00089A85

in textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\Skyrim.esm

==> 00089A85
==> 00089A85.tga

and in textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\HearthFires.esm

==> 00008B32.tga
==> 00015D5D.tga

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.


[size=4][b]Version:[/b][/size]

1.0 Initial release


[size=4][b]Known Issues:[/b][/size]

[list]
[*][size=2][size=2]Might not fit your personal taste[/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][size=2]
I'm sorry to say that but I'm not able to fix that.
[/size][b]

Credits:[/b][/size]

Caliente and Ousnius - for CBBE and Bodyslide
Bethesda - for Skyrim and the possibility to give it our own touch
[size=4][b]

Permission:[/b][/size]

If you have any questions feel free to contact me.
